turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order me a cup of coffee from Peets?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where is there a Peet's Coffee in this area?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: There is one in Hillcrest, on University Avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get me their Golden Caffe Latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Anything else, like milk type?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thanks for reminding me. Can you make sure the order is with Coconut Milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. How about the flavor of the latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't remember if that's an option.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will check. It does not appear that flavor is listed as an option.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have a size preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I will want a medium for this afternoon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A medium. Got it. I will repeat the information back to you, now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A Peet's medium Golden Caffe Latte with Coconut Milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Confirmed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Let me put the order in. Standby.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. The order is placed with Peet's on University using your account. It will be ready for pickup shortly. There should be a text confirmation on your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I saw the text confirmation. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any time.
